member.name: T:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService
member.summary: The main runtime interface to NPersist. This interface contains a subset of the methods available in the IContext interface.

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.TryGetObjectById(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Try to retrieve an object by its identity (returns null if the object was not found)
member.param: The identity of the object you want to retrieve.
The type of the object you want to retrieve.
member.returns: An object with the specified type and identity or null if no such object exists.

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.GetObjectById(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieve an object by its identity (throws an exception if the object was not found)
member.param: The identity of the object you want to retrieve.
The type of the object you want to retrieve.
member.returns: An object with the specified type and identity.
member.exception: Thrown when no object with the specified identity and type could be found

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.TryGetObjectByKey(System.String,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieve an object by a secondary, unique key (returns null if the object was not found).
member.param: The name of the key property.
The unique key value
The type of the object you want to retrieve.
member.returns: An object with the specified type and unique key value or null if no such object exists.

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.GetObjectByKey(System.String,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieve an object by a secondary, unique key (throws an exception if the object was not found).
member.param: The name of the key property.
The unique key value
The type of the object you want to retrieve.
member.returns: An object with the specified type and unique key value.
member.exception: Thrown when no object with the specified unique key value and type could be found

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.TryGetObjectByNPath(Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.Querying.NPathQuery)
member.summary: Try to retrieve an object by an NPathQuery query (returns null if the object was not found or if more than one object matched the query)
member.param: An NPathQuery object specifying which object you want to retrieve.
member.returns: An object matching the NPath query or null if no such object or multiple such objects were found.

member.param: The NPath query string specifying which object you want to retrieve.
The type of the object you want to retrieve.
member.returns: An object matching the NPath query or null if no such object or multiple such objects were found.

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.CreateObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Create a new object with the specified identity and type, registering it as up for creation. It will be inserted into the data source on the next call to PersistAll. Use this overload only for objects that do not have their identities generated by the data source or by an IdentityGenerator.
member.param: The identity for the new object
The type of the new object
Contructor parameters for the new object
member.returns: A new object with the specified identity and type

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.CreateObject(System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Create a new object with the specified type, registering it as up for creation. It will be inserted into the data source in the next call to PersistAll. Use this overload only for objects that have their identities generated by the data source or by an IdentityGenerator.
member.param: The type of the new object
Contructor parameters for the new object
member.returns: A new object with the specified type and a generated identity (in the case of a data source generated identity, the object will have a temporary identity until it has been persisted)

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.DeleteObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Register an object as up for deletion. The object will be removed from the data source on the next call to PersistAll.
member.param: The object to be deleted.

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.Commit
member.summary: Persist all changes to the data source, inserting all new objects, removing all deleted object and saving all modified objects.

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.GetNullValueStatus(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the null value status for the specified property of an object
member.param: The object with the property to get the null value status for
The name of the property to get the null value status for
member.returns: True if the property value is null, otherwise False

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.SetNullValueStatus(System.Object,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the null value status for the specified property of an object
member.param: The object with the property to set the null value status for
The name of the property to set the null value status for
The new null value status

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IPersistenceService.BeginTransaction
member.returns: An ITransaction object representing the local transaction

member.name: P:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.IContext.Timeout
member.summary: The timeout value in milliseconds that specifies how long this context will wait for a lock on the data source

member.name: M:Puzzle.NPersist.Framework.Mapping.IClassMap.GetSortedIdentityPropertyMaps(System.Boolean@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is primarily exposed for the Verifier visitors
member.param: Returns true if the identity propertymaps could not be sorted
Indicates if inherited identityproperties should be included in the result
member.returns: A list of the identity properties for the class, sorted by identity index
